version_description:
We’ve made enhancements to the payment experience for all users.

When requesting a card, employees must now provide a Request Reason for added context.

A new approval UX for approvers to make approving card requests quicker and easier.

Employees and Team Admins can now easily cancel cards in-app.

We’re also extending support for Multi-Factor Authentication to allow web portal users to easily access their TOTP in-app.
